sources.title: State Fair (1933)
sources.description: Janet Gaynor, Will Rogers,Â Lew Ayres, Victor Jory

metadata.Plot: The Frake family attends the Iowa State Fair. Father Abel enters his Hampshire boar Blue Boy in the hog contents; mother Melissa enters the mincemeat competition; and their young-adult children, Margy and Wayne, fine love with newspaper reporter Pat Gilbert and trapeze artist Emily Joyce. Will everyone return home safe and happy or will hearts be broken?
metadata.Writer: Sonya Levien, Paul Green, Philip Stong
metadata.Actors: Janet Gaynor, Will Rogers, Lew Ayres
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 2 wins & 2 nominations total
